title: Parts and Labor
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Attached to Motorco Music Hall and features a few clearly labeled vegan choices on menu and an occasional special. Sesame udon salad, baked beans, veggie samosa, edamame salad, namasu cucumber salad, and fries. Open even when there is no live music at the hall, and serves food til midnight. Extensive outdoor seating as well as inside. Full bar.
